REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2393 reute r f BC-PEPSICO-<PEP>-CHICKEN 06-01 0057

TEXT.TITLE: PEPSICO <PEP> CHICKEN UNIT COMMITS 40 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: Pepsico Inc's Kentucky Fried Chicken said it has committed 40 mln dlrs over the next 90 days to introduce a major new product category. The company said it is introducing Chicken Littles, a chicken patty sandwich served on a soft dinner roll, which will sell for 39 cts. Reuter
